exp_qc.node: The quality control procedures used. Typically these terms should come from the Experimental Factor Ontology. See for example the list of qc_type terms(https://www.ebi.ac.uk/efo/EFO_0004107)
The source of the Quality Control Type terms; his must reference one of the Term Source Names defined in the IDF file.
The accession number for this term, taken from the indicated Term Source.
